alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; St. Charles; St. Louis; St. Louis City (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Excessive Heat Warning issued June 15 at 2:04PM CDT until June 16 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...EXCESSIVE HEAT WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM CDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Dangerously hot conditions with heat index values near 105. * WHERE...The St Louis metro area in eastern Missouri and western Illinois. * WHEN...Until 8 PM CDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Heat related illnesses increase significantly during extreme heat and high humidity events.
info.instruction: People in the Saint Louis Metropolitan Area can get information about cooling centers or energy assistance related to the excessive heat by calling the United Way of Greater Saint Louis at 800-427-4626, or if calling from a land line phone dial 2-1-1. You can also call Cool Down Saint Louis at 314-241-7668.

area.areaDesc: Jefferson; St. Charles; St. Louis; St. Louis City
